author: jvanzyl
msg: - test the new feature whereby multiple contextProperties files

author: jvanzyl
msg: - allow the texen task's contextProperties to accept a comma
separate list of properties files to process.
this change is backward compatible, if you specify a single
file everything is fine. texen tests pass without a problems.
there was a case in the TDK where i needed two properties files
i can see where more testing is necessary. when 1.2 is release
i think it will be time to move texen (and anakia for that matter)
